comment.author: 59962848@N07
comment._content: My mother, Joan MOBBS, started school here in 1925, aged 5 years.

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/59962848@N07] Thanks for adding this info. You might also be interested in a 1912 watercolour of the school on the National Library of Australia catalogue here nla.gov.au/nla.pic-an5202301-s4-c1 AB
